attribute_definition: ID number associated with water system in the supplier service area. Data from SAFER Clearinghouse are reported by PWSID.

DWR assigned ID number associated with the urban retail water supplier. We used the publically available PWSID/DWR_ORG_ID crosswalk to map the DWR_ORG_ID to the PWSID. Note that there are many cases where there is no DWR_ORG_ID for a given PWSID.
Start date for time period that data applies to. Typically represents one month but may also include other frequncies such as one year.
End date for time period that data applies to. Typically represents one month but may also include other frequncies such as one year.
ID number associated with a water facility

Activity status of the facility. Levels = c("active", "not available", "inactive", "proposed", "proposed - new"
)

Availability of the facility. Levels = c("permanent", "emergency", "interim", "other", "seasonal", "not available"
)

Type of facility. Levels = c("spring", "consecutive connection", "well", "purchased", "non-piped, purchased", 
"intake", "non-purchased", "reservoir", "not available", "infiltration gallery", 
"non-piped, non-purchased", "distribution system", "st", "clear well", 
"treatment plant")

Type of water provided. Levels = c("spring water", "consecutive connections", "groundwater & gwudi", 
"hauled water", "surface water", "not available")
